title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 12, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 12, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Nlg
items.content_text:
### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [lightnlg (⭐3)](https://github.com/kasnerz/lightnlg) - A minimalistic codebase for finetuning and interacting with NLG models using PyTorch Lightning.
items.content_html:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • lightnlg (⭐3) - A minimalistic codebase for finetuning and interacting with NLG models using PyTorch Lightning.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [pins (⭐4)](https://github.com/mehalter/zsh-pins) - ZSH plugin for pinning directories. Like a CLI folder bookmark manager with tab completions.

### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [aofxta (⭐0)](https://github.com/aofxta/aofxta.zsh-theme/) - Includes decorators for last command's execution time, `git` information, current directory and current time.
*   [avoleo (⭐1)](https://github.com/flameleo11/avoleo-zsh-theme) - Features a date and time prompt for each command, as well as a command number in history. In addition, it uses special symbols '⠾' and '⡶' to display `git` information if applicable in the current path. It also supports custom colors based on the Gnome-Terminal default color palette.
*   [rkj-logik (⭐0)](https://github.com/logik93/rkj-logik.zsh-theme) - Based on omz's [rkj (⭐180k)](https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/blob/master/themes/rkj.zsh-theme). Includes decorators for user\@host, current directory, time & date.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • pins (⭐4) - ZSH plugin for pinning directories. Like a CLI folder bookmark manager with tab completions.

Themes / superconsole - Windows-only

  • aofxta (⭐0) - Includes decorators for last command's execution time, git information, current directory and current time.
  • avoleo (⭐1) - Features a date and time prompt for each command, as well as a command number in history. In addition, it uses special symbols '⠾' and '⡶' to display git information if applicable in the current path. It also supports custom colors based on the Gnome-Terminal default color palette.
  • rkj-logik (⭐0) - Based on omz's rkj (⭐180k). Includes decorators for user@host, current directory, time & date.

items.title: Awesome React Components
items.content_text:
### Icons

*   [Lucide (⭐18k)](https://github.com/lucide-icons/lucide) - Beautiful & consistent icon toolkit made by the community. Open-source project and a fork of Feather Icons.

Icons

items.title: Game Datasets
items.content_text:
### Dataset / Web

*   [CS:GO Steam Reviews](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/noahx1/csgo-steam-reviews) - Steam Reviews.
*   [Elden Ring Steam Reviews](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/noahx1/elden-ring-steam-reviews) - Steam Reviews.
*   [Hogwarts Legacy Reviews](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/georgescutelnicu/hogwarts-legacy-reviews) - A list of Hogwarts Legacy reviews.
*   [Most Played Games of All Time](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/faisaljanjua0555/most-played-games-of-all-time) - Steam game stats.
items.content_html:
Dataset / Web

  • CS:GO Steam Reviews - Steam Reviews.
  • Elden Ring Steam Reviews - Steam Reviews.
  • Hogwarts Legacy Reviews - A list of Hogwarts Legacy reviews.
  • Most Played Games of All Time - Steam game stats.

items.title: Awesome Sysadmin
items.content_text:
### Software / Backups

*   [Dar](http://dar.linux.free.fr/) - Which stands for Disk ARchive, is a robust and rich featured archiving and backup software of the tar style. ([Source Code (⭐153)](https://github.com/Edrusb/DAR)) `GPL-2.0` `C++`

### Software / Software Containers

*   [Podman](https://podman.io) - Daemonless container engine for developing, managing, and running OCI Containers on your Linux System. Containers can either be run as root or in rootless mode. Simply put: `alias docker=podman`. ([Source Code (⭐28k)](https://github.com/containers/podman)) `Apache-2.0` `Go`
*   [systemd-nspawn](https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/systemd-nspawn.html) - Lightweight, chroot-like, environment to run an OS or command directly under systemd. ([Source Code (⭐14k)](https://github.com/systemd/systemd)) `GPL-2.0` `C`
items.content_html:
Software / Backups

  • Dar - Which stands for Disk ARchive, is a robust and rich featured archiving and backup software of the tar style. (Source Code (⭐153)) GPL-2.0 C++

Software / Software Containers

  • Podman - Daemonless container engine for developing, managing, and running OCI Containers on your Linux System. Containers can either be run as root or in rootless mode. Simply put: alias docker=podman. (Source Code (⭐28k)) Apache-2.0 Go
  • systemd-nspawn - Lightweight, chroot-like, environment to run an OS or command directly under systemd. (Source Code (⭐14k)) GPL-2.0 C

items.title: Awesome Chatgpt

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Audio

*   [micropython-dfplayer (⭐19)](https://github.com/redoxcode/micropython-dfplayer) - Library to control the DFPlayer mini MP3 player module.

### Communications / RC receiver

*   [micropython-ppm\_reader (⭐12)](https://github.com/redoxcode/micropython-ppm_reader) - Library to decode PPM signals coming from a RC receiver.

### Motion / Servo

*   [micropython-servo (⭐19)](https://github.com/redoxcode/micropython-servo) - Library to control RC servos using direct PWM output in a tidy way.

### Motion / Stepper

*   [micropython-stepper (⭐19)](https://github.com/redoxcode/micropython-stepper) - Library to control common stepper drivers in a tidy way.
items.content_html:
Audio

  • micropython-dfplayer (⭐19) - Library to control the DFPlayer mini MP3 player module.

Communications / RC receiver

  • micropython-ppm_reader (⭐12) - Library to decode PPM signals coming from a RC receiver.

Motion / Servo

  • micropython-servo (⭐19) - Library to control RC servos using direct PWM output in a tidy way.

Motion / Stepper

  • micropython-stepper (⭐19) - Library to control common stepper drivers in a tidy way.

items.title: Awesome Privacy
items.content_text:
### ChatGPT

*   [llama.cpp (⭐83k)](https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp) - Inference of Facebook's LLaMA model in pure C/C++ so it can run locally on a CPU.
items.content_html:
ChatGPT

  • llama.cpp (⭐83k) - Inference of Facebook's LLaMA model in pure C/C++ so it can run locally on a CPU.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

*   [neanias/everforest-nvim (⭐356)](https://github.com/neanias/everforest-nvim) - A Lua port of the Everforest colour scheme.

### Terminal Integration / Diagnostics

*   [willothy/flatten.nvim (⭐653)](https://github.com/willothy/flatten.nvim) - Open files from terminal buffers in your current Neovim instance instead of launching a nested instance.

### Editing Support / Diagnostics

*   [willothy/moveline.nvim (⭐148)](https://github.com/willothy/moveline.nvim) - Move lines and blocks up and down easily, with indenting handled automatically as you move. Written in Rust.

### Indent / Diagnostics

*   [shellRaining/hlchunk.nvim (⭐788)](https://github.com/shellRaining/hlchunk.nvim) - A Lua implementation of `nvim-hlchunk`, contains more features, such as highlight `{}` chunk, indent line, space blank etc.
items.content_html:
Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

  • neanias/everforest-nvim (⭐356) - A Lua port of the Everforest colour scheme.

Terminal Integration / Diagnostics

  • willothy/flatten.nvim (⭐653) - Open files from terminal buffers in your current Neovim instance instead of launching a nested instance.

Editing Support / Diagnostics

  • willothy/moveline.nvim (⭐148) - Move lines and blocks up and down easily, with indenting handled automatically as you move. Written in Rust.

Indent / Diagnostics

  • shellRaining/hlchunk.nvim (⭐788) - A Lua implementation of nvim-hlchunk, contains more features, such as highlight {} chunk, indent line, space blank etc.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Go Generate Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [options-gen (⭐95)](https://github.com/kazhuravlev/options-gen) - Functional options described by Dave Cheney's post "Functional options for friendly APIs".
items.content_html:
Go Generate Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • options-gen (⭐95) - Functional options described by Dave Cheney's post "Functional options for friendly APIs".
